item.title: Remembering the Frontier Hotel & Casino: A Wild West Chapter in Las Vegas Strip History
item.description:
A Rollercoaster of Names and Ownership: The Frontier’s Tumultuous Past

Before the glittering megaresorts, before the themed hotels, the northern end of the Las Vegas Strip was home to a place that epitomized the raw, frontier spirit of the burgeoning desert city: The Frontier Hotel and Casino. But its story is far more complex than just a single name. The location itself has worn many hats, starting as Pair Oâ€™ Dice in 1931 and cycling through Hotel Last Frontier and New Frontier before finally settling on its most recognizable moniker in 1967.
